abstract: Increasingly large numbers of children, both boys and girls, are now suffering A.C.L. and knee meniscus tears, injuries that were uncommon 20 years ago, and doctors aren’t sure why.
snippet: Increasingly large numbers of children, both boys and girls, are now suffering A.C.L. and knee meniscus tears, injuries that were uncommon 20 years ago, and doctors aren’t sure why.

headline.main: A New Breed of Knee Injury in Young Athletes
